title: Bermuda Resident Captures Progression of Hurricane Humberto
text:
Hurricane Humberto brought high winds and stormy conditions to Bermuda as the edges of the Category 3 storm arrived at the island on September 18, causing power cuts and damage to some buildings.

The National Hurricane Center warned of potential flooding in Bermuda from “storm surge and dangerous breaking waves,” and said “a prolonged period of dangerous winds” was anticipated through Thursday, September 19.

Here, one local resident documents the effects of the storm on her local area and home. Credit: Carlita Lodge via Storyful
